analysis.description:
PornSceneToken.purchase (/unique_contracts/0x3a630495c7611b4da41bf133554374caa3963b75.sol#222-275) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- oldOwner.transfer(payment) (/unique_contracts/0x3a630495c7611b4da41bf133554374caa3963b75.sol#267)

PornSceneToken._paySceneStarOwners (/unique_contracts/0x3a630495c7611b4da41bf133554374caa3963b75.sol#275-290) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _pornstarOwner.transfer(fee) (/unique_contracts/0x3a630495c7611b4da41bf133554374caa3963b75.sol#287-290)

PornSceneToken._payAwardOwner (/unique_contracts/0x3a630495c7611b4da41bf133554374caa3963b75.sol#290-302) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _awardOwner.transfer(fee) (/unique_contracts/0x3a630495c7611b4da41bf133554374caa3963b75.sol#297-299)

PornSceneToken._payout (/unique_contracts/0x3a630495c7611b4da41bf133554374caa3963b75.sol#470-474) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ceoAddress.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_contracts/0x3a630495c7611b4da41bf133554374caa3963b75.sol#472-473)
	- _to.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_contracts/0x3a630495c7611b4da41bf133554374caa3963b75.sol#473-474)
